Description: Verify new folder creation and nesting of new folders.
Verify separators are properly added/deleted.
Verify that changes are saved over restart/crash

Change the name of a bookmark without use of the bookmark properties
      dialog.
surf using user-defined 'custom keyword'.
sort and reverse-sort per column
Verify that columns are resizable to show/hide more of entries

Determine whether text copied from a formatted web page (such as
      within a table) has a "non-annoying" layout.

Determine whether non-copyable page content such as UI widgets are
      correctly omitted from the Clipboard content.

Determine whether extremely large images can be copied from web
      pages.

Determine whether complicated rich text (such as massively nested
      tables) can be copied.
Vrify that dragging an image onto the desktop saves the image

Confirm that dragging a directory
      to the browser window displays the folder contents

Confirm that dragging an Internet shortcut to the
      browser window opens the URL

Feature: D&D from the desktop – Text files
Description:
Confirm that dragging a text file to the browser
      window displays the document contents

Verify that items dragged onto the
      application icon are handled properly

Verify that dragging the URL proxy icon to a browser
      window opens that URL in the target window

Verify that dragging a large (e.g. 5 MB) image across
      browser windows, to desktop, and into mail message
      works properly.

Verify that you can drag a URL or page content to
      an AIM window

Verify that you can save a form's data from the popup dialog
      box, never for this site and you are never asked again upon
      returning to the site.
Verify that the F1 key brings up the Help dialog

Verify that there are "Big tooltips" - Similar to popup help for
        Windows control panels

Verify that there is an in Index of help content and a list of
        keywords to links in the help content. (Verify the content is in local
        documents)

Verify that is it is possible to have favorite help topics -
        similar to IE help which has a special tab to add favorite help
        topics.

Verify that there is Troubleshooting Help about the problem "if you
        can't sign on"
Determine whether Help Contents displays correctly

Determine whether Instant Messenger help content displays
        correctly

Determine whether Understanding Privacy help content displays

Determine whether Creating web pages help content displays
        correctly
Determine whether Same time messaging displays correctly

Determine whether Netscape Technical Support displays

Determine that you can open all the selections in the Help drop

Verify that visited links are recorded.
Delete a History entry
Delete multiple History entries
Show and hide columns.
Don't ever show 302 redirects in history

Verify recently visited sites are in Back and Forward button

Verify browser goes back and forward correctly from page with
        frames.

Feature: Back and forward with named anchors
Description:
Verify browser goes back and forward correctly from sites that use
        named anchors

Determine that you are not able to resize an image to window when
        there is also text on the page, this is a stand alone image feature

Determine that you can right click an image and save to your local

To determine whether multiple differing animated images on the same

Determine whether X Bitmap (XBM) format images can be displayed.Note: XBM will not be supported in the initial 5.0

Test applets within <embed>, <applet> and

Test applets with liveconnect

Verify that the master password is visually distinctive from other
        password prompts (indicates the functionality and importance of the
        master password)

Verify that the process to replace a forgotten master password is
      easier/more discoverable (though encrypted information should still be
      lost to the user who has forgotten their password).

Verify that when you have saved multiple username's and password's
      for a website, you are later presented with those same choices

Verify that when you have saved a username and password for a website
      and you later change the password, that password manager picks up the new
      password

Verify that when you disable password manager from the preferences
      panel, you no longer are asked if you would like to save passwords and
      longer get prefilled info on sites

Verify that you can remove a username and password for a given site
      and it will no longer autofill on that sight nor will it be listed in
      password manager (espn.com)

Verify that when you have designated not to ever save a username and
      password in password manager, this information can be viewed in the
      password manager through tasks (nbci.com)

Verify that you can remove a username and password for a given site
      and it will no longer autofill on that sight nor will it be listed in
      password manager (netscape.com)

Open a nonexistent (bogus) web location.
Open web locations to various image files, such as.gif,.jpg.
